title: Bulky AMERICANA sort of typeface
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828042645im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/fairgrounds_4566.jpg)

looking for something like this, but more of a a bulky typeface with the usa flag for the credits of a short political satire film entitled USA

thanks to everyone in internet land.

 [‹ Stempel garamond](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828042645/http:/www.typophile.com/node/28971 "Go to previous forum topic") [Looking for fun, cool, interesting vector-based patterns. ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828042645/http:/www.typophile.com/node/28809 "Go to next forum topic")
author: ninogenio

comments.content:
[http://www.dafont.com/usstarsnstripes.font?nb\_ppp=50](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828042645/http:/www.dafont.com/usstarsnstripes.font?nb_ppp=50 "http://www.dafont.com/usstarsnstripes.font?nb\_ppp=50")

If you want something really bulky you are better off starting with a typeface and then adjusting it in Illustrator.

Tim
Stars n stripes looks an awful lot like Gill Sans Bold...

I thought that dafont were reasonably careful about that kind of thing, do you think I should delete the link?  
Tim
